name: Previous Wall
description:
In this game, the level changes when you undo a move. Every time you do so, the color on the bottom will switch to the next one. You can not pass through walls of the active color. 

Use your undo button wisely and complete these 10 levels.

This game was made in aproximately 3 days for Brackeys Jam 2020.2, under the theme "REWIND".
